sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-aside width="400px" style="background-color: #f2f2f2;"></el-aside>
    <el-main style="padding: 0;">
      <el-image
        style="width: 100%; height: 100vh;"
        src="imageUrl"
        :fit="fit"></el-image>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      imageUrl: '',
      fit: 'fill'
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.imageUrl = require('../assets/image/background.jpg');
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-container {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  
}
</style>
